record.title: EXCEPTION FOR THE $1 COIN DISPENSING CAPABILITY REQUIREMENT
record.narrative:
EXCEPTION FOR THE $1 COIN DISPENSING CAPABILITY REQUIREMENT -- (Senate - December 17, 2007)

[Page: S15787]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 515, H.R. 3703.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3703) to amend section 5112(p)(1)(A) of title 31, United States Code, to allow an exception from the $1 coin dispensing capability requirement for certain vending machines.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time, passed, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 3703) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
